summary: What do you mean by David has been acting weird lately? I hope good type of weird because i truly don’t even want to think about...
question: What do you mean by David has been acting weird lately? I hope good type of weird because i truly don’t even want to think about the fact that Skam france could end with fourth season.
answer: he made a vague post yesterday about how everything is ending and likes people’s comments saying that they don’t want skam france to end, so he’s weird not in a good way lmao, but he’s also our papa troll, and i don’t know what to expect from him lmao, all i know is if it was over it’s too strange to tell about it like that

summary: So you follow any skam France blogs? Which ones are your favorite? How do you decide who to follow?
question: So you follow any skam France blogs? Which ones are your favorite? How do you decide who to follow?
answer:
I follow loads of skam france blogs 💕 

here are some recommendations:

@aspewofnonsense @harryxtimmy @blarkejonsa @children-with-the-cheap-cocaine @frencheliott @cheloucas @adoredbyskam @naturallypossibe @tinyangryhedgehog @zahraako @eliottdemaurys @skamsluttt @noenoaholi @crickiesthalochild @hopelessbut-not-romantic @shipper-of-love @jesuistiredofyourbs @seriouslyidiotic @mysterygirl125-blog @starcassstic @donutsatisfied @parallelskam @lucasseliott @salutmonmec @remembermec

I don’t really have a criteria for following people. If I like their blog and if they seem nice, then I’ll follow :) 

it always helps if we actually talk but I don’t really have a criteria of sorts ♡

summary: About Eliott season, I wonder if they don't really know how to handle the other characters if he's not in highschool anymore....
question: About Eliott season, I wonder if they don't really know how to handle the other characters if he's not in highschool anymore. But they could let the crew appear some week-end (not like we see a lot the gang this season) And the gang could meet at his appart (their appart if he lives with Lucas by then). And I would like to see him make new friends and hang out with Idriss and Sofiane again.
answer: that’s true!! also you know i feel like there are just a few school clips in season four and we see imane at home or her and the girls hanging out somewhere so why don’t make something like that with eliott too? because you’re so right we barely see the boys this season, it will be okay not to see the girls for some time (i love them but you know lmao) and true about the boys, we can see them at lucas and eliott’s apartment (i love the way you think ahah!) or them hanging out somewhere, and god same about idriss and sofiane, i don’t want them to just vanish into nowhere, god i haven’t even though about this before and you made me to want a season about eliott even more :((

summary: Top 5 characters of skam universe
question: Top 5 characters of skam universe
answer:
Hello, i’m late hehwhw, but okay. Thanks for sending the ask btw. I’ve only seen og, druck, skam fr and bits of skam it and skam es (skam it and skam españa are not in the list -sorry- but shoutout to Giovanni)

5) Arthur (Skam fr). I love him, he is supportive, smart and funny. He deserves his own season!!!! I wanna know more about him!!!!!!!

4) Eva (og). I remember I fell in love with her on the first season. Strong independent woman who fucks up sometimes but is the best friend you could ask for™.

3) Isak (og). What can I say about him? He is a snake (and I love that, I know it’s wrong but i do, okay) but his character development… 10/10. Would totally adopt him.

2) Sana (og). MY GIRL. I love her so so much. She’s sassy and confident but so tender and caring. And she puts up with all the Vilde bullshit and you know, that shows strength™.

1) Matteo (druck). Okay, so i can’t believe he’s my favourite character, but he is. Maybe is because I feel like I’m so much like him. Maybe because I started watching druck at a very bad moment of my life but whatever…

He’s fragile, so so fragile, and affection starved, and yet he cares about everyone else so much, and he’s eager to learn and to love and be loved. Man, I love him. (Also, he is a snake and YES i love that, goodbye)

summary: i’m literally just tryna go into the skam france tag to check for posts about skam FRANCE, i wanna see posts about my fav...
body:
i’m literally just tryna go into the skam france tag to check for posts about skam FRANCE, i wanna see posts about my fav characters, i wanna see theories, edits, fics etc. if you wanna hate on it don’t put it in the tag keep it to your group chat. no one else wants to see it. targeting hate( and don’t act like it’s constructive criticism cuz none of what your saying is ever constructive it’s hate.ive seen maybe one thing that was constructive) at one remake is just causing even more of a drift between the fans, seriously if you don’t have anything nice to say don’t say anything at all. we all came from the same show you know. pls just keep you hate to yourself

tagging druck cuz we’ll i’m sure you all know why at this point

tags: uhhhh this got longer than i thought it would get jsfhsjhsfjhs
summary: taraaaa gimme me your top 5 college au headcanons for my elu babies okay ready set GO
question: taraaaa gimme me your top 5 college au headcanons for my elu babies okay ready set GO
answer:
1. in one parallel universe, lucas and eliott meet at a frat party. lucas is wearing a white snapback and has a little scruff, he is playing beerpong when all of the sudden he sees a gorgeous guy on the otherside of the table. it makes him miss his mark, dammit, and eliott just laughs at him while he has to chug his beer. later on, he finds him standing in the kitchen and says ‘you owe me for that round of beer pong’ eliott shrugs and asks why, lucas says: ‘because you are so hot it should be illegal’ they leave the party pretty much right after that for some more private fun

  2. in one parallel universe, lucas gets lost on his first day of college. he looks around campus, tries to make sense of the instructions he got but gets frustrated with every second that passes. his brows crease, and he nearly gives up and sees it as a sign to just go back home, when he hears someone say: ‘hey, do you maybe need a hand?’ he looks up at that, preparing himself to go off at this stranger, but he loses track of his thougts as the most gentle grey blue eyes stare back at him. ‘uhm, yeah, actually. I can’t seem to figure out where to go?’ he shows his phone to the tall hot stranger, who quickly gives him some directions. ‘thank you so much, I was this close to fleeing’ he gives him a grateful smile that mister mysterious returns with an: ‘i’m eliott, by the way’ 

  3. in one parallel universe, eliott is doing his laundrey when lucas walks in with a basket full of clothes. it’s overflowing, almost too much, he can barely see the boy behind the basket. he can’t help himself: ‘careful with that, you don’t want to trip and break your neck before finishing college’ he snorts out. the boy looks at him, slightly annoyed, as he puts down the laundry and starts to fill up a machine. ‘why, are you so sure that good things are coming after college? because that would be great to be honest’ he sounds a little bit defeated, probably had a rough week with all the exams. while the boy was occupied, he got to look at him without any shame. he was handsome, deep blue eyes, fluffy hair, and the most gorgeous lips. ‘i’m sure good things are coming after college, but why wait? i say let’s get these loads going and grab a beer. blow off some steam. how about it?’ he might sound confident but nerves get the best of him most of the time, the boy looks up at him curiously, thinks about it for a second. his eyes go over eliott’s face and body and back to his eyes again when he says: ‘okay, yeah, let’s do it’

  4. in one parallel universe, lucas is waiting in front of yann’s dorm. he is sitting on the floor, playing with his phone. yann calls him and let’s him know he is running late, and to please try and entertain himself if he can. lucas rolls his eyes and hangs up, just as he sees someone coming into the hallway. the guy in question looks at him, and he thinks to himself: god i must look like an idiot, sitting on the floor like this. he feels his cheek blush just before the guy asks him: ‘are you locked out? if you want you can come inside my dorm and wait there for your roommate to come home, i have some beers in the fridge. i would feel bad letting you stay out here all alone.’ lucas looks up at him and smiles, maybe it’s the fact that he has been sitting here for over 40 minutes, or maybe it’s this beautiful boy’s smile, but somehow he says: ‘okay, yes, thank you so much’ the boy let’s him inside, tells him his name is eliott and offers him a joint as well as some beer. he feels instantly relaxed, at ease with this boy. yann calls him 3 times before he picks up, only to yell at him: ‘where the hell are you??’ 

  5. in one parallel universe, lucas gets a new roommate midway through the schoolyear. it’s a pain in the ass because he was just getting used to college and all of the sudden his roommate decided to quit, was going to go travel to australia and work as a bartender. he is dreading getting to know a new person, badly. he likes what he knows, okay? he fully expects to get annoyed when the new guy arrives with a big box in his hand. what he didn’t expect is that the new guy would practically take his breath away. ‘hi, i’m eliott’ lucas has trouble responding like a normal human being at first, but manages to get out a: ‘hi, lucas’ before turning around to calm down. this is just a guy, nothing special about it. snap out of it. ‘so’ eliott starts after he has settled in ‘since i am new here, i was wondering if you would mind showing me around for a bit?’ lucas wavers, knows it would be an absolute nightmare to fall for his new roommate, and says: ‘i would love to’. he was in a lot of trouble.

reblog.comment:
1. in one parallel universe, lucas and eliott meet at a frat party. lucas is wearing a white snapback and has a little scruff, he is playing beerpong when all of the sudden he sees a gorgeous guy on the otherside of the table. it makes him miss his mark, dammit, and eliott just laughs at him while he has to chug his beer. later on, he finds him standing in the kitchen and says ‘you owe me for that round of beer pong’ eliott shrugs and asks why, lucas says: ‘because you are so hot it should be illegal’ they leave the party pretty much right after that for some more private fun

  2. in one parallel universe, lucas gets lost on his first day of college. he looks around campus, tries to make sense of the instructions he got but gets frustrated with every second that passes. his brows crease, and he nearly gives up and sees it as a sign to just go back home, when he hears someone say: ‘hey, do you maybe need a hand?’ he looks up at that, preparing himself to go off at this stranger, but he loses track of his thougts as the most gentle grey blue eyes stare back at him. ‘uhm, yeah, actually. summary: Y’all really need to go look at @maxencewithfans on Instagram
body:
Y’all really need to go look at @maxencewithfans on Instagram

That man is honestly the most genuine and down to earth person with his fans and i would do anything to meet him or the rest of the Skam France casttttt
